forum.content:
本來預計跟一個對象要去香港幫他過生日，現在取消了，不過飯店已經訂好且無法退訂,所以只會好硬著頭皮去了。找人一起9/24-26去香港，住港島五星級飯店海景套房，期間花費含機票食宿都由我負擔（購物請自理，等一下Chanel 逛兩圈我可負擔不起啊xd)。目前只是希望旅遊成行，散散心而已。

細節請再加我討論，沒什麼特別目的，只是想揮別不愉悅的情緒。

I was planned to go HK with my gal together but the schedule was messed for person reason. However, the hotel I booked is non-refundable which means I need to go there anyways. Thus, I'm seeking a person to go HK with me from Sep 24-26 which will stay two nights in 5 star hotel with great view of Victoria bay. All the cost is on my side n I just want to make it a trip to go over those bad moods.

Please add my account for further detail. I'm depressed to expecting to go over those bad memories during this journey.
forum.title: 找伴一起去香港玩（僅需支付香港自己的購物費用）
